snippet.title: Tower Wars Trailer!
snippet.description:
Gentlemen, and Ladies too! Tower Defense meets Tower OFFENSE this Summer!  Assemble the troops! Single file and TO THE DEATH!  One of the best looking and most fun titles you'll find anywhere in this genre!  Join us on...

Facebook - http://www.Facebook.com/TowerWars
Twitter - http://www.Twitter.com/@TowerWars
Steam Community Group - http://steamcommunity.com/games/towerwars

...for chances to win access the closed Beta Test, beginning Monday, July 9th! For more information, visit www.TowerWarsGame.com!
